name: The Passengers
description:
Save the passengers. Defend the passengers.

A lonely spaceship is on a trip back to mother earth, but something is going on inside it. You play as a computer, remote controlling the mechanics of the ship. Because of that the people on spaceship are pretty much OUT OF  direct CONTROL. As a second mission you also have to stop the virus infection from getting out of control.

This was the first game i ever published and i learned huge amounts. Thanks to YOYO Games for making Gamemaker Studio 2 this beautiful of a program.
